channel.title: Crash when loading the next level after 'Forget about Freeman'
channel.description: Hello, Crashing every time no matter what when loading the next level after 'Forget about Freeman'. No issues with the system whatsoever. i7-4990K, GTX-760, 32GB RAM, Samsung Pro 840 SSD Latest nvidia drivers Any help? Thanks. P.S. crash_bms.exe_20160114162624_1.dmp Your system reports 'File extension is invalid.' ???? crash_bms.exe_20160114162624_1.zip (268 KB)

item.title: Crash when loading the next level after 'Forget about Freeman'
item.dc:creator: alex.p
item.description:
Actually, this has helped

  1. Restart the computer. (shutting down and turning it back on is not the same in W8/10)
  2. Next, Verify the game cache. if you don’t know how, ask.
  3. Disable any and all mods, somes mods are broken after the update.
  4. Restart the chapter/level from the NEW game menu, not a saved game. A save could be corrupt.

Read full topic
item.source: Crash when loading the next level after 'Forget about Freeman'

item.title: Crash when loading the next level after 'Forget about Freeman'
item.dc:creator: alex.p
item.description:
Hello,

Crashing every time no matter what when loading the next level after ‘Forget about Freeman’.

No issues with the system whatsoever.
i7-4990K, GTX-760, 32GB RAM, Samsung Pro 840 SSD
Latest nvidia drivers

Any help?
Thanks.

P.S. crash_bms.exe_20160114162624_1.dmp Your system reports ‘File extension is invalid.’
???
